sentences.en: Her mistakes looked easily reparable in the light of her restored self - confidence .
sentences.cn: 她恢复了 自信心 以后,所犯的错误似乎也并非不可补救了.

sentences.en: Her mistakes looked easily reparable in the light of her restored self-confidence .
sentences.cn: 她恢复了自信心以后，所犯的错误似乎也并非不可补救了。

words.tran_cn: 可修缮的；可补偿的；可挽回的

trans.tran_en: able to be repaired, recovered, or remedied
